about_the_game:
You are an arena worker. The battle arena needs several things to operate properly:

  • Medical and ammunition kits on the right spots
  • Clean horizontal surfaces for contestants to move around (not slippery)
  • Solid covers without holes for proper protection
  • Flags of opposite teams ready for capturing
  • And most importantly your readiness for adapting to ever-changing scenarios of this battle arena



Mr. Mood is hosting the greatest tournament in the universe. 16 teams will be contesting for enormous cash prizes and the title of champions of the battle arena. And you must be proud to help Mr. Mood to fulfill this extraordinary goal because your prize is freedom. However:

  • If you fail to maintain the arena properly - the tournament restarts
  • If you favor one team more and create an imbalance - the tournament restarts
  • If you die from a stray bullet - the tournament restarts



You are not alone in this never-ending tournament. With every successfully finished task, you gain some spare money and if you won't be able to spend it during the tournament it will be deposited in the Arena Worker Fund. This Fund is not just a bag for your extra cash it is a cool system that will help you to work more efficiently:

  • Craft boosters from scrap you collect
  • Unlock new playable characters with unique abilities
  • Upgrade your permanent gear
  • Unlock synergies and create builds for your preferences
  • Hell, you can even bet on one of the teams for some extra cash



New tournament - new rules. The host is enjoying to watch every game, and to make it interesting Mr. Mood likes to refresh it:

  • Battle arenas (from ancient jungle temples to nostalgic city prospects)
  • Game modes (capture the flag, team death match, king of the hill)
  • Environmental conditions (weather, lightning, zero gravity)
  • Hundreds of teams ready to show their battle strategies
  • Various weapons for the contestants
  • And pretty much anything that can make a typical arena confrontation more fun

name: Arena Worker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 GT / AMD HD 6850 / Intel HD Graphics 4400 or above
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: People run, shoot, and obliterate each other in those battle arenas. Keep this place ready for the next mayhem by cleaning, repairing, and restocking its equipment in ever-changing scenarios. And nobody said that you are gonna do it between the rounds.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian
*languages with full audio support
